create

public static Statistics create(boolean enabled)
Creates a new Statistics instance which either actually gathers statistics or a dummy Statistics object that discards all data.

Parameters:
enabled - specifies if stats shall be gathered or discarded.
Returns:
a new Statistics instance

getEffectiveBackupProbe

public Statistics.MinMaxAvgProbe getEffectiveBackupProbe()
Provides info regarding the effective time that was required for session backup in the request thread and it's measured for every request with a session, even if the session id has not set memcached id (this is the time that was effectively required as part of the client request). It should differ from getBackupProbe() if async session backup shall be done.

Returns:
the effectiveBackupProbe
See Also:
BackupSessionService.backupSession(MemcachedBackupSession, boolean)

getBackupProbe

public Statistics.MinMaxAvgProbe getBackupProbe()
Provides info regarding the time that was required for session backup, excluding skipped backups and excluding backups where a session was relocated.

Returns:
the backupProbe
